title: Ranked 3v3 down?
body:
It clearly says that ranked 3v3 is 'temporally disabled' does this mean once the bug is fixed we can play 3v3?

or is this some cruel false hope...

replies.body: Heya, thanks for the question (and the screenshot).  We're working on an issue right now with Ranked Team queues, so we've disabled them for now until we get a fix going.  Once we fix the bug and get it out to everyone, 3v3 and 5v5 will be re-enabled.

'3v3 and 5v5 will be re-enabled.'
So does that mean ranked 3v3 will finally be enabled on OCE then?

No worries at all :) thanks for confirming this at least, and you can be forgiven for using generic messaging haha with many million players worldwide i doubt any other type of messaging would be practical haha xD 

but thanks for the reply, its always nice to know that RIOT looks after us haha :)
im just trying to find out what this "bug" is
